column9: Tater Tot Casserole (3 lbs Tater Tots
Chicken & Stuffing Bake (2 boxes Turkey Stuffing mix
Beefy Mac & Cheese (2 boxes Kraft Mac & Cheese

column6: Tomato Soup & Grilled Cheese (Tomato Sauce/Chicken Broth/Veggie Cans
Roast Beef Sliders (Roast Beef sandwich meat

column10: Pork & Potato Hash (Left-over Pork meat log

Dinner: Freezer "Leftover" Plate (Chicken Nuggets or Tater Tots)
column6: Kitchen Sink Casserole (Any remaining cans Corn/Peas/Broth

Week: Preheat oven to 400°F. Grease 9x13 dish. Brown 1.5 lbs beef with onion. Mix with 2 cans Cream of Chicken and 1/2 cup milk. Spread in dish. Top with 3 lbs Tater Tots. Bake 30-35 mins. Sprinkle 2 cups cheese, bake 5 more mins.

Preheat oven to 375°F. Grease 9x13 dish. Cube 2.5 lbs chicken, spread in dish. Whisk 2 cans Cream of Chicken with 1 can Evaporated Milk, pour over chicken. Prepare 2 boxes stuffing, spread over top. Cover, bake 30 mins. Uncover, bake 15 mins.
Boil 2 boxes noodles, drain. Brown 1.5 lbs beef with onion. Make cheese sauce with packets, milk, butter, add 1 cup cheddar. Mix noodles and beef into sauce.
Boil Penne. Brown 1lb chicken. Add to pasta with 1 can Evaporated Milk and cheese.
Make Instant Mashed Potatoes. Brown 1lb beef with onions/carrots. Add corn/peas. Spread in dish, top with potatoes and cheese. Broil 5-8 mins.
Brown 1lb beef. Heat Nacho Cheese with milk. Spread chips on pans, top with beef and cheese. Bake 350°F for 5 mins. Top with lettuce, tomatoes, sour cream.
Boil 2 boxes Penne. Brown 1/2 lb beef with onions. Add 2 cans Tomato Sauce, sugar, Ketchup/A1. Toss pasta in sauce, top with cheese. Serve with green beans.
Layer Lasagna Noodles, Lasagna Cans, cheese. Bake at 375°F for 30 mins.
Bake Chicken Nuggets. Make Instant Mashed Potatoes. Serve together.
Assemble Roast Beef on buns with Mayo/Mustard.
Cook Spaghetti O’s and Penne with Sauce. Heat Green Beans.
Cook rice. Warm Chipotle Chicken. Fill tortillas with rice, beans, chicken, cheese. Roll.
Dice potatoes, par-boil 5 mins. Fry onions in butter, add potatoes till crispy. Add diced pork, season with salt/pepper/A1.
Cook Elbow Noodles. Heat Chili Cans. Mix together.
Heat Chicken Broth, add noodles/rice, celery/carrots.
Mix remaining cans with stuffing. Bake at 350°F for 25 mins.

Meat: 10lbs Ground Beef, 5lbs Chicken Breast, 1 pack Hot Dogs/Ham. Produce: 10lb Potatoes, 5lb Onions, Carrots, Celery, 2 heads Lettuce, Apples/Bananas. Dairy: 4 gallons Milk, 3lb Cheddar, Butter, Sour Cream. Bakery: 6-8 loaves Bread, 2 packs Buns, PB&J, Large Rice. Total ~$280-370
